text: 17.11 Jon 10.30, 13.1, 17.21, 1 Pi 1.5, Jud 1 Nad mɨdeban ak nɨnɨgebin agak. Yad lum awl pel ma yenɨgayn, bɨyad pen kɨli lum awl yenɨgabal agak. Bapi, nad bɨ suŋtep yɨbɨl mɨdeban agak. Nad bɨawl yɨb awl mɨdeban tek, yɨp age abe mɨdebin agak. Nad yɨb awl mɨdeban anɨb ak, kɨlop kod yenɨmɨn, chɨlapɨl bɨ nokom tek lup ak tek, kɨli abe jɨj nokom jɨmñɨl yenɨgel agak.
